item.title: Midterm 1 Solutions
item.description: Question 1. I think that lecture 01 sufficiently covers the different concepts and you received significant marks if you acknowledged some of the central issues discussed there. I did remove marks if there wasnâ€™t care taken to discuss security and address the fact that Cloud solutions are likely not possible with clinical samples (unless extreme care is given either through cryptography or through special types of cloud computing). This aspect of the question builds on Question 1 of assignment 1 that asked you to investigate what rights Google reserves when data is stored on their server.

item.title: Midterm 2 - BIOL 480/510/630
item.description: Fall 2020. M Hallett and A Eftyhios The midterm must be submitted by 2:30pm on Thursday October, 29th, 2020 to \({\tt biol480.concordia@gmail.com}\) All answers in one email. Subject header of email is Midterm 2, Lastname, Firstname, student ID. You can use whichever media you prefer to answer your questions. This is open book, so you can use whatever resources you would like, but you must cite them. You are not allowed to speak to each other or other experts in this field (eg students who previously took the course).
